Control Name: 3.2.2 There are well-defined performance requirements for the workload and its key scenarios.
Control Statement: Non-functional performance requirements, such as those relating to end-user experiences (e.g. average and maximum response times) are vital to assessing the overall health of an application, and is a critical lens required for assessing operations.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 3.2 Have you identified the performance targets and non-functional requirements for your workload?
control_attributes.Control: 3.2.2 There are well-defined performance requirements for the workload and its key scenarios.
control_attributes.Description: Non-functional performance requirements, such as those relating to end-user experiences (e.g. average and maximum response times) are vital to assessing the overall health of an application, and is a critical lens required for assessing operations.
